TopicTitle: How do you record videos on PC Like youtubers?

Articles.Content:
What program do you use to record KSP videos as i would like to create some

for PC.

I use fraps it records in HD and also records game sounds and sounds from your microphone aswell

There are others out there but pretty much all of them you need to pay for it
Are there any free or open source options?
I generally use BANDICAM, alows limit of 10 min on free version, plus less lag!
Point your camera at the monitor lol.
And then you get REALLY crappy videos? Ive seen people do it, and the lighting, the shakyness, its very bad. Dont forget that not everyone holds a video camera!
I found a free solution. I'm using GameBooster 3.5 and it has a video capture function. Things seem to be running a bit smoother as well, so that's a plus.
MSI Afterburner (a gpu tool) lets you record stuff and if you want encode it on the fly (only mjpg though). Doesn't blow up your hard drive with crazy file sizes for long videos like fraps.
